p: In the last century, influenza viruses of three HA subtypes (H1, H2 and H3) thus acquired the ability to be transmitted efficiently among humans. In addition, influenza viruses of the H5, H6, H7, H9 and H10 subtypes are also considered to represent pandemic threats since they have crossed the species barrier and infected humans ( Table 1). Fortunately, these influenza viruses so far lacked the ability to spread efficiently between humans.
